name: The Southampton Model Railway Exhibition
transport: Free heritage bus service between college and Eastleigh/Southampton Airport Parkway stations approximately every half hour from 9:30am
description: Barton Peveril College is about 1 1/2 miles from M3 Junc 13 or M27 Junc 5 and will be AA signed from shortly after the junctions. Eastleigh and Southampton Airport Parkway stations are both about 25 mins walk.

name: Irvine Model Railway Exhibition
venue: The Linthouse Building, Scottish Maritime Museum
description: After a very successful Exhibition in the Scottish Maritime Museum in 2022 it has been agreed that there will be an Exhibition in 2023.

name: Model Railway Exhibition
description: Annual exhibition celebrating 60 years since the founding of Kendal Model Railway Club

name: Longfield Model Railway Exhibition 2023
description: The Erith Model Railway Society's January Exhibition, one of South East England's largest shows (And probably Kent's largest by stand numbers), will return to the Longfield Academy for our 6th show there (And our first since 2020). The show will continue to encompass at least 30 layouts, extensive trade and society support, demonstrators, static exhibits and charity raffle, making nearly 90 stands in total.

name: Exhibition
organizer: Basingstoke & North Hants Model Railway Society
description: Step aboard for a journey through miniature worlds! Basingstoke & North Hants Model Railway Society is thrilled to host another highly anticipated Model Railway Show in 2026, Where the magic of railways comes to life in stunning detail! Please join us to see a great line-up of Layouts, Societies, and Traders!

name: Exhibition
description: Join us for a special Model Railway Exhibition at Denbies Wine Estate, celebrating the 40th Anniversary of Roxley Models, set against the stunning backdrop of the Surrey Hills. This family-friendly event is perfect for enthusiasts, hobbyists, and anyone curious about the world of model railways.

name: RISEX
organizer: Risborough and District Model Railway Club
address: Wades Park, Stratton Rd, Risborough, HP27 9AX

name: RAILEX
organizer: Risborough and District Model Railway Club

name: Exhibition 2026
address: Fullers Way North, Tolworth, Surrey, KT6 7LQ
specialFeatures: Various scales including N, OO, O gauge
description: Annual model railway exhibition organized by Hampton Court Model Railway Society featuring multiple layouts across different scales, trade stands, and refreshments.

name: The London Festival of Railway Modelling
specialFeatures: Largest model railway show in London
Wide variety of scales and gauges
description: The London Festival of Railway Modelling is one of the UK's premier model railway exhibitions, featuring over 50 layouts covering all scales and gauges, more than 80 traders, demonstrations, and special guests. Held at the iconic Alexandra Palace, this two-day event showcases the best of railway modelling.

name: The Festival of British Railway Modelling - Exhibition
address: Peterborough Arena, Mallard Road, Peterborough, PE4 6NA
description: The Festival of British Railway Modelling is the UK's largest model railway exhibition featuring layouts in all scales and gauges, over 100 trade stands, demonstrations, workshops and activities for all the family.

name: The International N Gauge Show - Exhibition
address: TWarwickshire Event Centre, A425, Southam Road, Leamington Spa, CV31 1FE
specialFeatures: One of the largest N Gauge shows in the UK
description: The International N Gauge Show is one of the premier N Gauge exhibitions in the UK, featuring around 60 layouts from across the country and internationally, alongside approximately 40 trade stands. The show includes demonstrations, competitions, and provides a comprehensive showcase of N Gauge railway modelling.
